snippet: A new report on the effects of global warming on the United States is alarming and can no longer be ignored.
abstract: Editorial asserts alarming National Climate Change Assessment brings distant threat of global warming solidly into the present; anticipates challenges Pres Obama will face both in enforcing limits on carbon dioxide emissions he has already declared and in devising new rules governing natural gas drilling; warns regulations will meet stiff resistance from climate-change deniers in Congress and industry allies.
lead_paragraph: A new report on the effects of global warming on the United States is alarming and can no longer be ignored.
